friends.name: Shabazz
friends.description: Shabazz is the greatest companion one could ask for. He loves to play with you, and will climb a tree faster than you can say "Lemur"!

friends.name: Patrick
friends.description: Patrick is a starfish caught in the shallow reefs near Australia. He is a very social star, and will sometimes wear green pants.

friends.name: Igor
friends.description: Igor is an Elephant from the great land of Kenya. He loves to swim, and will show you how if you don't already know!

friends.name: Dory
friends.description: Dory is a blue tang caught in the Atlantic Ocean. She is very sweet, but struggles with memory problems.
